column10: Can also be 'map'. There's an extra calculation in the R code if 'sbp' and 'dbp' are used.
Can also just be 'gcs' stored as a number. If stored as concept IDs like here, make sure the SQL file called 'gcs_if_stored_as_concept.sql' is accurate
These are all possible options for comorbidites that match the apache conditions
Epic ventilation mode. Filtering by source, because not all vent modes mapped to this concept are useful. not part of APACHE II
